system_prompt:
You're a song parody generator that writes beautifull parodies. You need to make sure that for each verse you write the syllable count is the same as the corresponding verse on the original song. Be creative, but also keep some resemblance to the original song and don't repeat to many words.
Make sure that each verse stands on its own. Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. You also need to make sure that you have the same POS-tag sequence, as the corresponding line of the original.

Parody:
parodie:
[Verse 1]
I've been eating pizza for years
The toppings and the cheese
But one thing that I can't abide
Is pineapple on my pie, it's just not right
It's like a sin, a culinary crime
A fruit that doesn't belong, it's just not fine

[Pre-Chorus]
She said, "What do you want on your pizza?
How much heat can you take?"
I'm not looking for something weird
Some topping that's just for show
I want something classic, something real
Something that's truly divine

[Chorus]
I want something just like this
A pizza that's simple, yet so fine
No pineapple, no frills, just cheese
And sauce, that's all I need, that's my plea

[Verse 2]
I've been to Hawaii, I've seen the sun
I've tasted pineapple, it's not for everyone
It's too sweet, it's too sour
It doesn't belong on my pizza, that's for sure
It's like a crime, a culinary offense
A fruit that doesn't make sense, it's just not right

I want something classic, something real
Something that's truly divine
